name: Hex Tunnel
description:
Enter another dimension and master the elements to become a surpreme being. With arcade, chaos and ultra modes in procedural stages ensures a unique experience.

Avoid all surfaces and reach the exit to be victorious.


Features
• classic arcade gameplay style updated to the new age of VR

• Arcade - gamemode features ICE / FIRE / WATER / EARTH / AIR
elements are levels with distinct objects to avoid
• Chaos - chaotic combination of sections without a theme
• Ultra - speed is the focus

• in game gaze based VR navigation
button input not required for gameplay control
